name: ChemCaper™: Act I - Petticles in Peril
description: ChemCaper is a chemistry adventure game that will get your kids to love science! Get them excited to learn basic Chemistry concepts on the gadget they know and love. Explore unique environments, craft potions, and battle with collectible creatures, all based on Chemistry concepts and the Periodic Table!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ Windows Vista/ Windows 7/ Windows 8.1 Processor: x86-64-compatible 1.4GHz equivalent or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB NVIDIA DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
